= Pascal Module Compiler (PMC) =

What PMC does is to compile directly a free-pascal unit file to a lysee module.

By the time, PMC is packed in _*lysee_pmc*_, a standalone console program.

== 1. PMC Usage ==

|| *usage* || *description* ||
|| `lysee_pmc` sample.pas || wrap sample.pas to samplew.pp ||
|| `lysee_pmc` -osample.dll sample.pas || wrap sample.pas to samplew.pp and compile samplew.pp to sample.dll || 

== 2. Content Of sample.pas ==

{{{
unit sample;

{$mode objfpc}{$H+}

interface

uses
  Classes, SysUtils; 

function MaxStr(const S1, S2: string): string;

implementation

function MaxStr(const S1, S2: string): string;
begin
  if S1 >= S2 then
    Result := S1 else
    Result := S2;
end;

end.      
}}}
